metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1419 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the power policy functions in policy-funcs inacpi-support before 0.142 allows local users to gain privileges viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

acpi-support - 0.142
No subscription required

criterions.comment: acpi-support package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.142').
